name: Love Game's: Wai Wai Tennis
overview: Love Game's: Wai Wai Tennis is the first game in the tennis series for the Playstation One and is a tennis arcade oriented game. The game have three play modes: -Story mode: Create a new tennis player (male or female) and follow his story playing in different courts against different opponents and make him (or her) the champion. -Vs mode: Play against the computer or another human player (or players) in different courts. -Edit mode
